content: the soft beret created by crochet&copy the soft beret materials 1 skein of bernat softee baby yarn color soft peach light 3 100% acrylic crochet hook size h8/5 00 mm yarn needle scissors stitch marker stitches/abbreviations chain s = chain s st s = stitch es single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch decrease = single_crochet 2 stitches together repeat = repeat work directions in brackets the number of times specified notes magic_ring = wrap yarn into a ring ensuring that the tail falls behind the working yarn grip ring and tail between middle finger and thumb insert hook through center of ring yarn over with working yarn and draw up a loop work stitches of the first round in the ring after the first round of stitches are worked pull gently on tail to tighten ring how to single_crochet 2 stitches together decrease = draw up a loop in each of next 2 stitches yarn over hook and draw through all 3 loops on hook make sure to put the stitch marker in first stitch of each round if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial link below measurements one size to fit most adults instructions note increase rounds round 1 make an magic_ring chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch work 6 single_crochet in the ring mark first stitch with stitch marker do not join total of 6 sts round 2 2 single_crochet in each st around total of 12 sts round 3 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 18 sts round 4 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 24 sts round 5 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 30 sts round 6 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 4 more times 1 single_crochet in last 2 sts total 36 sts round 7 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 5 sts repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 42 sts round 8 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 6 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 4 more times 1 single_crochet in last 3 sts total 48 sts round 9 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 7 sts repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 54 sts round 10 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 4 more times 1 single_crochet in last 4
